channel.title: Attack xp

item.title: Attack xp
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

Im trying to add attack xp. Like hit a dummy you get attack xp.
This is what i used:

case 2516:
            if (GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
                if (actionTimer == 0) {
                    sendMessage("attack");
                    actionTimer = 10;
                    setAnimation(1658);
                    addSkillXP((9000000* playerLevel[0]), 0);
                    stillgfx(246, absY, absX);
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                }
            }
            break;

It doesnt work, whatd i do wrong?

Read full topic
